member.name: M:CroudSeek.API.Controllers.DataPointsController.GetDataPointsForQuest(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the datapoints for a particular quest
member.param: The Id of the quest the datapoints belong to
member.returns: A list of Datapoints belonging to the quest.
member.response: Returns the DataPoints for the Quest Id

member.name: M:CroudSeek.API.Controllers.DataPointsController.CreateDataPointForQuest(System.Int32,CroudSeek.API.Models.DataPointForCreationDto)
member.param: Id of quest for which datapoint will be created

member.name: M:CroudSeek.API.Controllers.DataPointsController.PartiallyUpdateDataPointForQuest(System.Int32,System.Int32,Microsoft.AspNetCore.JsonPatch.JsonPatchDocument{CroudSeek.API.Models.DataPointForUpdateDto})
member.summary: Partially update a DataPoint for a Quest
member.param: Id of Quest the DataPoint belongs to
The set of operations to apply to the DataPoint
member.remarks: Sample request (this request updates the name and description) \ PATCH quests/questId/datapoints/dataPointId \ [ \ { \ "op": "replace", \ "path": "/name", \ "value": "NEWNAME" \ }, \ { \ "op": "replace", \ "path": "/description", \ "value": "NEWDESCRIPTION" \ } \ ]
